metadata.name: crApollo
metadata.description: Get ready to experience the cutting-edge of digital art with 'crApollo', the first NFT minted using the revolutionary style of crap art. This daring and unconventional piece celebrates the beauty in the imperfect and will take your NFT collection to the next level. Featuring bold material choices and a mesmerizing color palette, 'crApollo' is more than just a piece of art - it's a statement. Don't miss your chance to own a piece of history and be a part of the future of digital art with 'crApollo'
